mapper.sql: id, remote_report_id, checknum, report_image_path, writeDocCode, writeDocName, writeupdatetime, verifyDocName, verifyDocCode, verifyupdatetime, remark
mapper.select:
select
from temporary_report where writeupdatetime=(select max(writeupdatetime) from temporary_report where checknum=#{checknum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) and checknum=#{checknum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into temporary_report (id, remote_report_id, checknum, report_image_path, writeDocCode, writeDocName, writeupdatetime, verifyDocName, verifyDocCode, verifyupdatetime, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{remoteReportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checknum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportImagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writedoccode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writedocname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{verifydocname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifydoccode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update temporary_report

where id = #{id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}
